Title: Teaching History with Simulations and Game Based Learning (e203)
Description:
History teacher David Harms uses simulations to teach history. Whether it is World War 1, 2, the Cold War or the American Civil War, learn how these immersive “games” teach history much more deeply than most textbooks.
